Uses of Package
com.nokia.midp.examples.wma.chat

Classes in com.nokia.midp.examples.wma.chat used by com.nokia.midp.examples.wma.chat
AddPeerScreen
          Extends the WMAForm class and provides a screen to add peer
ChatNameScreen
          Extends the WMAForm class and provides a field to enter a chosen chat name.
ChatScreen
          Extends the WMAForm class and provides a screen to display messages that are sent and received.
MessageHandler
          Handles setting up a connection and the sending and receiving of messages.
OutgoingMessage
          Holds a String containing the address to send a message to and holds a String containing the message to send.
PeerListScreen
          Extends the WMAForm class and provides a ChoiceGroup populated with the possible peers in order to select the Peers to send messages to.
ScreenHandler
          Handles the screens required by the MIDlet and the user interaction with them.
WMAForm
          Extends the Form class to provide the common elements for all the screens.
WMAMIDlet
          Handles the setting up of the application.
WriteScreen
          Extends the WMAForm class and provides a field in which to add text to be sent.
